name: Space Escape (Sam23)
description:
A princess has been taken from their kingdom before the coronation could take place. While extra-terrestrial beings have found this kingdom and captured them, both are sent across the galaxy so that experiments can be carried out on humanity. You will have to survive, fight your captors in order to return home unharmed. 

Controls 

  • Move- A/D  or left/right arrow
  • Jump - Spacebar 
  • Attack - left click

Platform Assets 

Kenny Assets
